website_summaries.verdict: A large bag that features extra insulation, but the zipper isn't great.
pros: This leak-proof bag has a 5-gallon capacity and includes Triple-Tek foam insulation and Temperfoil
Includes sturdy handles and an exterior pocket for extra storage
cons: The zipper is just OK quality and can break easily

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic zipper, Amazon refuses to replace within 30 days, manufacturer disvows the product.  Totally unsatisfactory.
customer_reviews.text: Within two weeks of purchase and used perhaps twice, the plastic zipper pull broke off. Amazon refused to replace the item and told me to go to the manufacturer (very disappointing). So, I go to the Rachael Ray website, they identify their manufacturer/supplier as Meyer Corp. I mail it to them for almost as much as the bag cost. I got it back today from Meyer disavowing any responsibility for the bag. Just a bad experience all the way around--cheap zipper, Amazon declined to replace it, the Rachael Ray company disavowed the product. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after first use
customer_reviews.text: This tote fell apart after only one use - one handle broke off, the other handle tore, the zipper broke, and the actual zipper fell off. I didn't place anything in it that was out of the ordinary. Highly recommend purchasing another brand instead. And I just now login to return it but can't because I'm just past the 30 day mark. Amazon - do you give an exception to mothers with babies who also travel for work? #notime
customer_reviews.author: Kristin P. Simons

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for keeping groceries safely chilled!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe that I didn't think of getting an insulated bag sooner! I routinely go to multiple grocery stores and was always worried about perishables in the trunk of my car, especially on a warmer day. I still strategize my trips, but this bag really puts me at ease. I grab an ice pack from the fridge and pop it in here, then everything chilled has a place to stay a little safer. It had really good ratings at Cook's Illustrated, who actually tested things like how well it kept things chilled, so I'll have to trust them on that one. The quality looks and feels very nice.
customer_reviews.author: LovetoCookTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and decently insulated
customer_reviews.text: This bag is constructed really well. I've overloaded it a few times and it hasn't ripped, no zipper issues. My only wish is that it was a little bit better insulated. I sometimes buy groceries by work before I go home and my frozen stuff gets home a bit thawed after a 40 minute drive. But that isn't even that bad, most people don't make a 40 minute trip after grocery shopping. I'd buy this again if mine ripped.
customer_reviews.author: RandieB

customer_reviews.title: Practically a pop-up refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: These insulated bags are a game-changer for parties: One or two of these and a 10-pound bag of ice are all it takes to accommodate drinks that would otherwise occupy valuable fridge space or simply go unchilled. They fold flat, so they can be kept in a closet until needed and even pulled out at the last minute if a guest shows up with a six-pack or a bottle of bubbly that you weren't anticipating. The bright colors allow them to be distributed around a living room for a serve-yourself atmosphere.is great too.
customer_reviews.author: H James Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke
customer_reviews.text: Loved my bags at first - they were a perfect size to hold a lot of items and keep cold but yet not too big that you cannot carry easily on your shoulder. Well, I have had mine for a months (bought 2) but kept forgetting them and have only used a handful of times and the zipper just broke on one of them. :( I am still using the other one but now I am waiting for that one to break too (did not overfill either when it broke). I am disappointed because they look well made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your groceries cold in the hot car! Without an ice pack!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cooler. I live in the South and going from the grocery store to home in the summer with ice cream in the car can be challenging. I have tried many types of coolers and this is by far the best. Keep an eye on Amazon because the coolers occasionally go on sale. I have purchased these as gifts for Christmas this year. PS - Get the larger size cooler.
customer_reviews.author: P. King

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than expected
customer_reviews.text: This was great! I intended this for a CA trip to make due with a fridge in our hotel room that was too small. We had 2 of these for our family of 6, we would fill them with zip lock gal bags of ice from the ice machine, and use as fridge. We got a 5 gal bag for our day trips. We would just take all our lunch supplies and have a tailgate party lunch, then go back into the park (Sea World etc). Collapsed small enough to take on the plane in our 2 allotted items (carry on and personal item).
customer_reviews.author: Carla Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the cool things cool, and the hot things hot.
customer_reviews.text: I leave it in my car, where the temps get over 130. Even so, if I forget to take it into the store, I can toss whatever cold items in there, and they are still cold (or frozen) when I get home. It reacts to temp. changes very quickly, and is roomy enough for 2 full bags of frozen items, or 3 if you get say, bagged veggies that can be smooshed around to fit. Haven't needed to wash it, but I'd recommend giving it a sponge bath - a full on tumble cycle might be too rough for the inside lining material.
customer_reviews.author: B.H.

customer_reviews.title: Works well if you add ice pack(s)
customer_reviews.text: With ice pack (s) it does keep frozen meals from defrosting from 7a.m. until 1p.m., so that was very positive. Without ice pack(s) it did not keep the food cold for more than an hour. That would make it very good for bringing groceries home and keeping them cold, but not good for a picnic without ice packs. A bit hard to clean the inside really well if anything spills because the "foil" interior is not fully attached to the insulated "foam" layer, but not something that would make me NOT buy it. Glad for the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A. Keiper-Kintz

customer_reviews.title: Not durable, don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very disappointed in this product. I assumed the lining would be durable, but the edges of my chill packs poked right through it. This results in anything spilling in the bag to pour right out the bottom and soak your car seats (like 16oz Of milk). These perforations happened within the first week. I will not recommend this product to anyone. What a waste of money. I thought Rachel Ray’s products were of better quality than this (as are the other products I’ve purchased from her line).
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Kellas

customer_reviews.title: Great but overpriced
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cooler bag. We use it for grocery shopping. It takes us a good 45 minutes to get home and with a couple blue ice packs we can even get ice cream home in the summer without any melting issues. After I bought this though I saw very similar looking ones at Trader Joe’s for a fraction of the price and wonder if they would be just as good. I really like the product but feel like it is probably way overpriced for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good cooler bag
customer_reviews.text: I purchased to use on the weekends at the softball field to hold fruit and snacks (I do not put bottles of water inside) The first one broke the day I used it. The company promptly sent me a new one. No problems with the second one. It keeps ice cold all day in 95-100 degree weather in the shade.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Price

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, just fits where I need it
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a cooler that zipped to keep the cold in and that would fit behind my front seat and this fit the bill! I love it, works so much better than my previous one that was the same shape but had flaps on both sides that let the cold out and the heat in. This one is taller too so I can get more in it.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Great Concept, Cheap Zipper
customer_reviews.text: So convenient for keeping groceries cold or as a travel cooler. Only downside is the zipper is plastic and comes of the track easily. Go with a larger bag, as you can't completely fill it, as the pressure on the zipper will cause it to pop off. I have gone through two bags that were new condition, but plastic zipper came apart. I expected higher quality from Rachael Ray.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J.

customer_reviews.title: Thermal Tote
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended on a cooking show I watch (not Rachael's) and I wanted one to keep in the car for when I shop. I was meeting a friend for a show and lunch so I took some plastic "frozen ice" out of my freezer and put them in the bag. I took my food into the house but forgot about the ice. The next day they were still partially frozen and the bag was cold on the inside. I would highly recommend this. I also put items in there when shopping and going from store to store without the frozen ice and they stay nice and cold until I get home. I believe this also works with hot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lining has changed, and so has size
customer_reviews.text: I have an original RR bag which I bought a few years ago after recommended by ATK. Just ordered and received a 2nd one. The lining is from a different manufacturer now, and the sides of the bag are thinner. Overall the bag feels flimsy and it has also gotten slightly larger, which I do not like. I do not have time or energy to "see if this bag is as good as the original". Disappointed and am in the process of returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is probably one of the best things I ever purchased here.
customer_reviews.text: This shopping tote is one of the most used items I ever purchased on Amazon. Its very sturdy and has held up really well. I also bought the jumbo size but the handles on that one are too long, so that when you carry it, the bag is almost dragging on the floor. This one is the perfect size for a quick trip to the grocery store and the fact that its insulated, is a bonus. The best re-usable bag that I've bought.
customer_reviews.author: EDJ

customer_reviews.title: Summer ice cream grocery shopping panic attacks!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the sole purpose of quelching my OCD when transporting ice cream from the grocery store to my home in hot, humid upstate NY summer heat. No more getting huffy with slow pokes in the grocery store in an attempt to rush my purchase home to the freezer. Life-changing.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Schuler

customer_reviews.title: It does what it says it will do!
customer_reviews.text: I have had several of Rachael Ray's insulated bags over the years. I live in Arizona and for 6 months it's HOT.....so I depend on insulated bags to bring my groceries home. They are always still cold, and I've never been disappointed. I just recently ordered another one because I love them. They are light weight, and just the right size. Some bags are too large, and then consequently too heavy when they are filled. These bags are the perfect size, and great colors. You won't regret your purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Valle

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: These are great bags! They hold a ton, really insulate and are quite durable. I have had 2 of these bags for at least 2 years and use them constantly. They show no wear whatsoever other than surface dirt. I haven't ever cleaned the outsides, but have easily wiped out the insides. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Jones

customer_reviews.title: This bag is perfect! My mother in law talked about how well ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect! My mother in law talked about how well hers was so I bought one. Love it! I had put my cold groceries in it, and it kept them perfectly cool! I know, the grocery store isn't that far, but we ended up getting detoured with other errands and they were in there for a good hour and a half on a 60° day. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Best ever for groceries or anytime I need a cooler!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these bags for years and recently got more! They are so handy for grocery shopping- they size compare to the old paper bags that were the norm back in the day. Great functionality, hold up really well to heavy loads, and keep the frozen stuff frozen! Have gotten more drools over these at the grocery store! These are the best!
customer_reviews.author: Lovin Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Size but not very cold
customer_reviews.text: I really needed something that could hold meals and snacks for the whole day. I have another Rachel Ray bag that is half the size but it couldn't hold much more than 3 snacks. SO this size is great! However my food doesn't seem very cold like in the other bag. I even have three ice packs inside. I'm guessing it is jsut becuase it is so much larger. it works for me but I wouldn't trust it with meat or mayo type items without multiple ice packs for just half a day. The size though....can atleast 3 gallon size milk jugs! It's huge for a lunch bag!
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t do what I need
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to bring home takeout food, which always seems to get cold. Unfortunately, the bag causes a buildup of steam and so the food is warm but soggy. It would probably be better for cold items.
customer_reviews.author: Mollysmom

customer_reviews.title: This bag is a great size and wonderful quality inside and out
customer_reviews.text: This bag is a great size and wonderful quality inside and out! Easy to wipe clean if anything spills on the inside and keeps cold items cold. I often take it to the beach and use it as our cooler. The shoulder straps allow easy carrying and keeps my hands free.I put bottled waters on the bottom of it and pile the rest of our food on top. Really holds quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Mamax2

customer_reviews.title: Great size if you work long shifts
customer_reviews.text: Keeps things cold for several hours. Large size makes it a good alternative to a lunch box if you work long shift and need to bring enough for more for more than one meal. Fits several containers, 2 water bottles, a wallet, fruit, a snack and then some. Update: I've been using this bag 4 days a week for 18 months, still in great shape, no rips, washable, keeps food cold for over 5 hours. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: maryel2

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I am very hard on my lunch bags since I make my lunch everyday at work. I eat something about every 2 1/2 to 3 hours. This bag is very durable. The material is thick and the straps seem to be very sturdy. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Charimone

customer_reviews.title: Americas Test Kitchen winner
customer_reviews.text: Americas Test Kitchen winner. I take this to the supermarket ith me especially during the summer. Keeps everything frozen for an hour or more if necessary which makes it perfect to take on car rides, to the beach, tailgating and on picnics.
customer_reviews.author: Lola Fanelli

customer_reviews.title: Good Size, Keeps a Chill
customer_reviews.text: This is a good-sized, insulated grocery bag. I can get lots of groceries in it without it being too big & cumbersome to carry. Everything stays nice & cold for several hours so I can use this bag instead of a cooler to transport food to my cabin. This bag is not meant for a weekend of camping - you would be better off using a regular cooler for that. I would rather have 2 bags of a good size, like this one than an oversized bag. If you get a really large bag & don't have it full, things will not stay cold as long & the bag is really heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Katawampas

customer_reviews.title: Super Handy Tote
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this thermal bag! This is ideal for keeping in your trunk for those summer days grocery trips. This tote is thin and folds up nicely to take up little room in the car, or inside the pantry at home. We keep one in the house, and one in the car at all times. This also works great for transporting hot foods to friends and family get togethers, or taking extended road trips that you need to keep some items chilled in. Overall made well, and would recommend this product to anyone in search of a nice thermal tote.
customer_reviews.author: TizzieTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Good quality bag, not much room
customer_reviews.text: I put 6 frozen personal pan pizzas in the bag and was not left with enough room for a gallon of milk. The bag seems to serve its purpose of keeping cold food cold; I was just surprised to find it was not as large and useful as I was expecting. In retrospect I would look for a larger bag or order more than one.
customer_reviews.author: Liam

customer_reviews.title: purchased just in case, ended up using after power outage
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it to use as a portable tote. We had an extended power outage here in CA due to wildfires. I used this bag to keep our food cool while I moved everything to our friends house until power was restored. So glad we had it handy. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke first use
customer_reviews.text: The zipper immediately broke the first time we used it. It is a circular zipper so it popped right out and couldn't get back in. Complete and total waste of money... Very poor quality...
customer_reviews.author: 123sAnonymous

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, keeps things cool
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and keeps things cool. I actually use the 10 gallon sized one more than this, but together they make a trip to the grocery store less stressful when you are worried about getting home without things melting (I live a ways out of town). The green was a bit cheaper than the other colors when I bought mine, and while it's not my favorite color, it's growing on me.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great idea!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third one of these. It was a gift and immediately the couple was arguing over who got to keep it in his/her car. Fortunately my husband and I each have one. Use it ALL THE TIME.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and practical!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! I purchased it to mainly carry some things to work, such as my water bottle, umbrella, magazines for reading on my break, my frozen lunch entrees. Sometimes after stopping at the grocery store after work, I like putting hot or cold foods in it until I get home. I am very happy with it and loved the color choices that were available. The price was good as well. Nice, sturdy bag!
customer_reviews.author: nalby0513

customer_reviews.title: Badly attached hang tag
customer_reviews.text: This would have been a great bag, but the manufacturer's hang tag (that big attachment that flutters in the breeze) was so tightly affixed to the strap that the strap got cut when I tried to remove the tag. The strap then raveled, and I ended up throwing the bag out.
customer_reviews.author: Ososanna

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, except the straps
customer_reviews.text: Hold a lot, kept frozen items frozen for two hours in 90 degree weather when left in car. We put a lot of groceries into it, and it was quite heavy (gallon of milk, several packages of meat and frozen veggies). All 5 stars. Deducting one star for the strap not being padded, it was uncomfortable to carry it in. But that's my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: hexe983

customer_reviews.title: and kept things cool all day
customer_reviews.text: I bought this prior to taking a two month trip up and down the West coast, so I got a lot of use out of it. I'd take ice from the hotels I was staying at, put it in a zipper bag (I didn't want water all over) and then load the tote with my food and drinks. The bag holds A LOT, and kept things cool all day. It worked great. Now that I'm home, it's practical for picnics and bringing home groceries from the store. I like it and use it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great Thermal Tote!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. The color is really nice and works for men or women. We use this for my sons cooling vest to keep it cold when we send him to school for him to wear at recess. It works perfectly and the ice packs stay frozen until he comes home. Roomy and affordable
customer_reviews.author: Christine Hanily

customer_reviews.title: Thanx Rachael Ray!!!
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a shoulder bag cooler to take along on road trips or use to carry cold or frozen foods home from the grocery store or for a picnic....a well-made simple to clean bag was our hoped for product. This bag meets all of our expectations and is very stylish and a bit trendy!! Last year we purchased a Kate Spade 'grass' picnic blanket...oh-lala!! These two ideas are a statement for a picnic and paired with our watermelon painted picnic basket....we look mighty fine at the river or a roadside park or a festival!!! It cleans easily and has an outside pocket, too!!! thanx Rachael Ray!!!
customer_reviews.author: terreb  (2D)

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made tote.
customer_reviews.text: The tote bag turned out to be larger than I expected and I won't be using it for lunches but instead will take it with me to the supermarket and large box stores for refrigerated purchases. Very nice bag.
customer_reviews.author: SandyL

customer_reviews.title: Great grocery bag for cold stuff
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to store my cold products when I go grocery shopping. I can fit a ton of stuff. Wish I had gotten 2 but just started with one. Easy to carry, easy to clean, and keeps my cold food cold until I can make it home after running all of my weekend errands.
customer_reviews.author: Pau Rom-Rod

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t keep ice frozen long at all.
customer_reviews.text: This bag was okay. It’s sturdy and has good material on the outside. The inside looks like it’s a cheap foil material. The zipper doesn’t have a good seal where it ends at which is why I believe it doesn’t keep ice frozen long at all, because it has a hole in both corners. Had to consistently add ice because of fear of my stuff not staying cold.
customer_reviews.author: Claribel

customer_reviews.title: Ripped seam :(
customer_reviews.text: ended up getting a hole in the seam only after a handful of uses which is a shame because I love this tote!
customer_reviews.author: K.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed, especially after reading glowing reviews
customer_reviews.text: The cheap plastic zipper broke only after one use. Extremely disappointed, especially after reading glowing reviews. Disappointed that Rachel Ray would put her name on such a cheaply made bag... and plastic zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Beach

customer_reviews.title: The very best thermal tote
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several different thermal tote bags over the years, and never really liked any of them. They were either too large and bulky, or too small, or leaked, or had a funny smell to them. The Rachael Ray ChillOut Thermal Tote is the best thermal tote that I have ever used. It is the perfect size for even warehouse store shopping, like Costco, and is extremely well insulated. It keeps frozen food frozen for a long time. It doesn't leak at all, and there is no smell coming from it at all. Besides all that, I love the orange color and the look of it. It is very stylish and attractive looking. I really love it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, huge, comfortable to carry and durable enough to last forever.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best reusable grocery bags ever. I bought some black ones years ago. They are amazingly durable, have huge capacity and keep cold things cold, or hot things hot. Straps are very comfortable. Cashiers always comment on how great these bags are.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Haft Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality! The front of the bag was stitched bad. The trim was twisted on one side then sewn under the seam. Also the material on the inside looks and feels cheap. I previously purchased the jumbo bag which is great but this one doesn't compare.
customer_reviews.author: Mags514

customer_reviews.title: Great for kayaking trips :)
customer_reviews.text: Have used this with much success. I usually put three large frozen ice packs, plus frozen waters, with lunch fixings on top so things won't get so squished. We took this on a kayaking trip on ocean. This tote sat in full sun about four to five hours before we ate. Things were good and cold when we took a lunch break. We did this several times while in Florida. I think the longest we went before eating and this tote being in full sun was six hours. Things were STILL good and cold. I'm really satisfied with this. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: L. Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag sad can't us , dam covid 19
customer_reviews.text: Well wanted this bag for months, got it for one month the covid 19 came. No more bring our own bags. Great bag bad time for shopping bag business.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps food cool as it should. Just fine for returning from grocery to home and a stop off for beer on the way home is in order.
customer_reviews.author: Clipper

customer_reviews.title: Good for small amounts of food
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little bag, key word "little". Because of the way it is made it does not hold much, However I use it for food deliveries and it is good for small orders, but nothing more. I guess I expected it to be a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca S

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to take to the beach to put in soda and bags of ice. It kept the ice all afternoon very only a small portion that melted. Bag is a very nice size. Not too small and not too big and folds flat which is a great option for storing The bag exceeded my expectations as I figured I would throw it out after a couple uses but quite the opposite Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Charles J. Humes

customer_reviews.title: great for pizza!
customer_reviews.text: the size is perfect for 2 large pizza boxes. Kept it really warm even after 30 mins. Kept some of my cold stuff cool, but not as cold as i would like it.
customer_reviews.author: Ben New York

customer_reviews.title: Great cold bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good bag for holding cold items until you get home. It's not cumbersome, easy to load and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: pinkpanther

customer_reviews.title: It really keeps my groceries cold until I get home (a good 40 min
customer_reviews.text: I use this bag constantly. It really keeps my groceries cold until I get home (a good 40 min. ride). If I remember, I put an ice pack on the bottom and it keeps my groceries even colder and better. Would highly suggest purchasing. Works like a pro. I haven't used bag for hot items yet but I bet it works just as great for the hot items. This bag holds a lot of items. I still plan on purchasing the bigger bag in time too.
customer_reviews.author: lorraine petersen

customer_reviews.title: Great Cooler Bag
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these and my mom liked them so I bought one in her favorite color for Christmas. Bag was fine but the packaging was torn. Thank goodness the bag was not damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Mo

customer_reviews.title: Thermal tote bag.
customer_reviews.text: I carry this light weight bag in my car to put my frozen items in at the grocery store in. It is great to carry and lift in and out of the car.
customer_reviews.author: cjhlp

customer_reviews.title: Large & Folds flat for travel
customer_reviews.text: This bag is larger than I expected. I wanted something that would fold flat in my suitcase, but also would work as a cooler at the beach as well. This bag will do the trick. It will definitely hold ice and drinks and snacks. I watched the video of the items that would fit in the bag and still I was surprised at it's large size when it arrived. The bag fits in the bottom of my suitcase perfectly and will serve it's purpose well.
customer_reviews.author: KinDallas

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not 5-gallon capacity!
customer_reviews.text: While the bag is of very good quality I had to mark the product down because of the fact that it is fact not 5 gallons in capacity. I would have to say it is closer to 2.5-3 gallons maximum. I was expecting a much bigger bag when I ordered this and was let down big time.
customer_reviews.author: D Del

customer_reviews.title: Great bags, but the handles should be longer.
customer_reviews.text: These are great bags... very well built and worth getting. However, while these bags may be hung on one's shoulder, the fit is a little tight... it's a bit tricky. If the handles were a bit longer, I could easily toss one bag on each shoulder and carry two or more bags with my hands. If each handle was about 6 to 8 inches longer, these bags would be (near) perfect and get 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: dorkboy

customer_reviews.title: Well made and functional
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for friend who transports groceries in the back of car. Using as such, and works fine. Will also be used for outdoor trips during the summer. He said it's keeping things cold and working great. Attractive color - seems well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Richard J. Ferrante

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because the price was decent. The second time I used the bag the zipper did not work properly. It did not zip the bag closed. I had read about this in some of the reviews. But I thought I would try it as I'm not using it for heavy duty items. I was able to fix the zipper so that it works. I used this at the beach for the day. It kept some small items cool.
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this cold and hot bag , it keeps the cold stuff cold and the hot stuff hot , when I checked out of the store I spent another hour shopping and when I got home every thing was still frozen . I would recommend this to every one
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Denardo Jr

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Tote
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect - I bought this on the recommendation of America's Test Kitchen. I bought 4 - one for me and one for each of my sisters. We all love it. It's the perfect size, light, folds perfectly, it's inexpensive, good-looking and keeps food at the temperature it needs to be kept at. Great buy, great gift - my sisters were shocked that this was under $15.00.
customer_reviews.author: GayGuy Approved

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: These bags do not hold up. I used 1 of them 3 times and the zipper broke. I do not over stuff any bag. They are just poorly made. Very cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: My❤isatthebeach

customer_reviews.title: Used twice and the zipper broke. We moved and ...
customer_reviews.text: Used twice and the zipper broke. We moved and put all the freezer items in them even with a broken zipper the food stayed frozen.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Good for husbands lunch
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a police officer and doesn't always get his scheduled meal, so this is great, I can pack him his lunch with snacks drinks and it will hold hid huge hydro flask and still have plenty of room. This is large, well made and has shown very little to no wear after 2 years. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Tancredi

customer_reviews.title: Good quality thermal tote!
customer_reviews.text: I think I bought about 11 of these and I have none of these bags left. No matter how many I buy someone wants the tote. It holds heat and cold very well. And if my sons, nieces and my sister want them, I’d say they have good taste.
customer_reviews.author: RUQnBee?

customer_reviews.title: You need this bag
customer_reviews.text: My family loves to eat so my bag gets plenty of action (at family gatherings, picnics, church outings, etc) and is standing up nicely to the pressure. It's very roomy and keeps all the food nice and cold. I've even recently begun taking it with me to the grocery store to help cut down on the amount of plastic bags I use. This bag is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: C.L. Green

customer_reviews.title: doesnt work to keep cold
customer_reviews.text: wonder if people actually used this ... i put a bag of ice on bottom of it... 1 min later the floor the bag was on was freezing ... this it total fail.
customer_reviews.author: Peet Peet

customer_reviews.title: Tall And Narrow
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag. Taller and more narrow than expected, but it fits in the work fridge. We use it to store our creamer for the coffee club.
customer_reviews.author: AJay_89

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! Perfect for camping, boat rides, long drives, whatever you want. I put drinks and food and it all stays cold for hours!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Fortier

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: I live in south Florida. Buying frozen foods in the summer can be ridiculous. This is a game changer. I can now make it home with ice cream still frozen solid.
customer_reviews.author: ADM

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP POS BAG! RACHEL RAY=POOR PRODUCTS!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is a POS!!! Rachel Ray should be ashamed to put her name on such a poor quality item. Zipper busted after first use. Really? Who puts a cheap PLASTIC zipper on things anymore? A sturdy metal would have cost what? Like an extra $.10? Rachel Ray’s means cheap to me now!
customer_reviews.author: Fred Nietzsche

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Use to drop off ice cream to Dad in senior home. Keeps everything cold & easy for staff to deliver items to his room without those plastic grocery bags fits about 2 containers of ice cream & 2 paper towel rolls for his monthly needs.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Coghill

customer_reviews.title: My bag
customer_reviews.text: This perfect for Florida for sure. Keeps things cold till you get home.
customer_reviews.author: Pattybear

customer_reviews.title: Great insulated tote.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag. We put two bottles of frozen water in it along with 6 frozen meat items and drove eight hours. When we got to our destination, the food was still frozen. We also used this bag when traveling and just going to the grocery store. It's a lifesaver when it's really hot out and you don't your frozen items to start melting in the car on your way home.
customer_reviews.author: eliane a.

customer_reviews.title: It was ripped right away.
customer_reviews.text: Im sad it ripped in 2weeks time. Hope for a refund or send me a new one pls?
customer_reviews.author: happy

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a hot/cold bag for some different uses. One to use while traveling, could also be used for trips to the farmer's market or bringing home leftover lunch/dinner on a day trip. Nice size, looks like it will hold quite a bit. Could gave bought the large one but it seemed a little bit too large and cumbersome. This is a great size for what I want to use it for!
customer_reviews.author: SophieMaria

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the nicest and most efficient thermal tote I have had. I use totes a lot to avoid using plastic bags and we also shop frequently out of town so bring cold or frozen foods home and may make a stop or two on the way. Love it. Have already given one as part of a gift and would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Feels and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this tote and I already love it. The colors pictured are true to the actual item (green/chocolate), and it feels like a quality bag. I can't imagine how big the "jumbo" size would be, since this bag is fairly large itself. I purchased it to keep our meats chilled on grocery/errand days--and will test that out soon. My first impression, though, is that this tote will hold up quite well. The stitching looks great, the size is perfect, and it's all around attractive. :)
customer_reviews.author: Navy Mama

customer_reviews.title: Just ordered another one
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great bag, my favorite every day grocery bag.The size is good, zips up, holds a lot and the handles are long enough so it can hang on the shoulder. Also, when it's hot outside you don't have to run right home with your groceries. I have not tried it under extreme conditions yet, but I just ordered another one.
customer_reviews.author: hunny

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this on the recommendation of America's Test Kitchen, and they were not wrong! Generally, I avoid chef-branded gear, as it's usually low-quality stuff - you end up buying the name, not a quality product. However, this insulated bag is the exception to that rule - roomy without being so big as to become impossibly heavy when full, well-constructed, and most importantly, keeps cold items cold. We keep it in the back of the car, where it does double duty in keeping our take-out pizza warm on the ride home (works great!). Definitely a worthwhile purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dandykins

customer_reviews.title: Great insulated bags.
customer_reviews.text: I have three of these bags I use to go pickup groceries. It helps keep them cold in the Arizona heat. I love these bags.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Keeps stuff COLD
customer_reviews.text: The first bag I had that actually kept stuff cold in the bag
customer_reviews.author: chrisackley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For short term use where a cooler isn't worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleasantly surprised with this. My main concern was how waterproof it would really be and it was completely water tight and didn't leak a drop. Kept ice from fully melting for about a day in 70* weather. So it's great for short term needs.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel L

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag!! The best thing is that it doesn’t look like its thermal from the outside!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Wish the base was a little wider otherwise it keeps things cold & warm.
customer_reviews.author: BennyB

customer_reviews.title: It is huge!
customer_reviews.text: It can hold a gallon of milk plus all other cold items from the store.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M. Buchmeier

customer_reviews.title: KEEP IN YOUR CAR FOR EVERYDAY USE!
customer_reviews.text: This is just like fans of America's Test Kitchen led us to believe... and so good I bought three for everyday transportation of cold food items from the grocery store... Well-made and attractive....
customer_reviews.author: Borderlass

customer_reviews.title: Always in my car!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this. We live almost 30 minutes away from our grocery store. This keeps temperatures for either hot or cold for a good while. We have stopped for lunch after shopping, these in the back of my car full of groceries, then the 30 minute drive home, and all our things survived perfectly. They make a "Jumbo" sized one, which I might get later on for pizza runs. This one fits one Little Caesars box snuggly. It'd be nice to have the larger size for 3 boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Harpster

customer_reviews.title: This is roomy , and a good value for your money
customer_reviews.text: I gave it as a gift for my son-in-law, he lives it , he uses it in his shop
customer_reviews.author: Amazon costumer

customer_reviews.title: Great Insulated Bag!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a second bag to keep in our second car so we always have an insulated bag with us. These bags are great!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Great insulated shopping bag.
customer_reviews.text: Faithfully take this on all my summer shopping trips. This is not a really large bag but works well for shopping for two.
customer_reviews.author: Monalisa

customer_reviews.title: Good size and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It's a good size but it's thin so but sure it insulates that well. I'll use for grocery shopping but not much else.
customer_reviews.author: Jen W.

customer_reviews.title: Like this product
customer_reviews.text: Love Rachel Ray bags no matter the size. These are a decent size, but I must admit I am partial to the jumbo bags.
customer_reviews.author: E. Durham

customer_reviews.title: Great Thermal Bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made, sturdy bag that really keeps its contents cold or hot. It has a zipper which keeps in the heat or cold. I have been looking a long time to find a decent thermal bag, and this is the one. Highly recommended. I have both the regular size and the large size, and use it for shopping as well as bringing home take out food, which it keeps very warm.
customer_reviews.author: Snowy16

product_meta.title: Rachael Ray ChillOut Thermal Tote Bag for Cold or Hot Food, Insulated, Reusable, Blue
product_meta.description: Color:BlueChillout with this classic, insulated shopping tote from Rachael Ray. This large, reusable bag has a roomy 5-gallon capacity making it the perfect bag to bring along to the market, to parties, the beach or camping. The bag is constructed of built-to-last, easy clean 600 denier polyester material with Triple-Tek insulation and Temperfoil ™ lining with a radiant barrier for exceptional retention of heat and cold, so frozen food and refrigerated groceries stay cold until you get home. It has comfortable handles to make carrying easy and a handy, exterior pocket for extra items. Measures approximately 18.5" X 6" X 16.5" and folds for easy storage when not in use.
feature_bullets: LARGE CAPACITY ZIPPERED TOTE: 5-gallon capacity is great for grocery shopping trips, the beach, parties, tailgating, camping and more
TRANSPORT FROZEN, COLD OR HOT ITEMS: Constructed with Triple-Tek foam insulation and Temperfoil lining with a radiant barrier
LEAK PROOF LINING: Temperfoil lining with sealed seams protects against messy leaks and drips and wipes clean easily
ADDITIONAL FEATURES: Has comfortable handles and an exterior slip pocket for small items
EASY TO STOW IN YOUR CAR OR AT HOME: Bag measures approximately 18.5" X 6" X 16.5" and folds for easy storage when not in use
